Title: shutdown -r
Writer: Sam Esmail (created by), Sam Esmail, Adam Penn (executive story editor), Randolph Leon (executive story editor), Courtney Looney (story editor)
Actors: Rami Malek, Carly Chaikin, Portia Doubleday, Michael Cristofer
Plot: Elliot tries to save Darlene, but things don't go as planned; Mr Robot must decide whether to step up or step back.
